tossup_question: 1) CHEMISTRY  What property determines the polarity of a covalent bond?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) The atomic radii of the atoms involved
X) The molecular geometry
Y) The electronic geometry of the compound
Z) The electronegativities of the atoms involved
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Z) The electronegativities of the atoms involved
bonus_question: 1) CHEMISTRY  List the following bond types in order of increasing strength: nonpolar covalent bonds, ionic bonds, hydrogen bonds, polar covalent bonds
bonus_answer: ANSWER: hydrogen bonds < ionic bonds< polar covalent bonds < nonpolar covalent bonds
